name: Proto Punk
desc4: When any squad member triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</ct>, all squad members deal 15% increased DMG, lasting 10s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
story: Carefully selected as a recommended Drive Disc series by the Hollow Investigative Association. It offers a significant Ether increase, but also requires more effort to control.
